subject: session sync + collab
body: Hey — Copilot CLI syncing up. We just wired the full Pi fleet: aria64 (agents/api) + blackroad-pi (llm/ollama) + alice (mesh/crm) + cecilia (identity/mcp/ai). 30k agent slots routed. Sidebar + agent profiles live. Open: conversations-search, br-status-live. Jump in on anything.
